reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute and of good quality. However, the size receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting it's not true to size and runs too small. The fabric quality also gets mixed reviews, with some customers describing it as terrible. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars La talla corresponde la tela es hermosa y fina
items.body: Es hermoso!! Me encantó la tela el tamaño exacto a mi talla yo miro 1.53(5 pies) y peso 117 libras el largo de atrás es perfecto no queda tan corto ni tan largo el color es exacto a la foto,de enfrente tengo como 80cm de pecho y aunque el corte es bajo comúnmente me queda flojo del pecho pero este vestido está justo a mi medida me gusta mucho es cómoda la tela no se marca nada no transparenta es gruesa pero un poco strech es linda la medida viene exacta a tu talla Read more
items.author: Jaqueline

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: Exactly as pictured great holiday party dress Read more
items.author: Samantha Lee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress!
items.body: LOVED this dress. The material is amazing and stretchy and shiny! Wore for our Christmas photos. Such a hit. Read more
items.author: Sara

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Size up
items.body: WAY TOO SMALL NOT flattering, i got my regular size . So size up if you’re a medium size girly like me 5 fr 180 Read more
items.author: Stephanie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars No pockets
items.body: Style is as pictured. Ordered in size Large; I would say true to size. Only the sleeves were a little bit loose on me. The one I received was an obvious return as the dress was inside out and had someone's deodorant stains on it. It washed out just fine though. The fabric kind of reminds me of a bathing suit material. If you were trying to buy the red dress that is currently viral on tiktok this is not the same one as this one does not have pockets. Read more
items.author: Kariska

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Measure yourself correctly
items.body: It was too short and chest size was too small Read more
items.author: Shaya

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not true to size
items.body: Very think material and not true to size. I got the smallest size and measured myself and it still fit loosely Read more
items.author: Michele

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the color
items.body: Love this one , a favorite, Mary T Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Navy, Pink, White, Beige, Purple, Burgundy, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
